skills.name: Configure Store
skills.pattern: import { configureStore } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'; export const store = configureStore({ reducer: { counter: counterReducer } })

skills.name: Create Slice
skills.pattern: createSlice({ name: 'counter', initialState: { value: 0 }, reducers: { increment: state => { state.value += 1 } } })

skills.name: Export Actions
skills.pattern: export const { increment, decrement, incrementByAmount } = counterSlice.actions

skills.name: Prepare Callback
skills.pattern: addTodo: { reducer(state, action) { }, prepare(text) { return { payload: { id: nanoid(), text } } } }

skills.name: Typed Hooks
skills.pattern: export const useAppDispatch = useDispatch.withTypes<AppDispatch>(); export const useAppSelector = useSelector.withTypes<RootState>()

skills.name: createAsyncThunk
skills.pattern: createAsyncThunk('users/fetch', async (userId: string) => { const response = await fetch(`/api/users/${userId}`); return response.json() })

skills.name: Extra Reducers
skills.pattern: extraReducers: (builder) => { builder.addCase(fetchUser.pending, (state) => { state.loading = true }).addCase(fetchUser.fulfilled, (state, action) => { state.user = action.payload }) }

skills.name: createEntityAdapter
skills.pattern: const usersAdapter = createEntityAdapter<User>({ selectId: (user) => user.id, sortComparer: (a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name) })

skills.name: Entity CRUD
skills.pattern: usersAdapter.addOne(state, user); usersAdapter.updateOne(state, { id, changes }); usersAdapter.removeOne(state, id)

skills.name: Create API
skills.pattern: createApi({ reducerPath: 'api', baseQuery: fetchBaseQuery({ baseUrl: '/api' }), endpoints: (builder) => ({ getUsers: builder.query({ query: () => 'users' }) }) })

skills.name: Mutation Endpoint
skills.pattern: addUser: builder.mutation<User, NewUser>({ query: (body) => ({ url: 'users', method: 'POST', body }) })

skills.name: createSelector
skills.pattern: const selectTotalPrice = createSelector([selectItems], (items) => items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price, 0))

skills.name: Redux DevTools
skills.pattern: Automatically enabled in development with configureStore

skills.name: TypeScript Types
skills.pattern: export type RootState = ReturnType<typeof store.getState>; export type AppDispatch = typeof store.dispatch
